column3: Latest;Siem Reap: A Korean citizen was sent back to his home country from Siem Reap International Airport on Flight BX-722 (REP-PUS) to South Korea on May 2
column7: had been illegally residing in the country. He entered in 2014 (*appears his visa ran out in 2016).------He was ------arrested on March 14th------ at a travel agents in the town. The order for his deportation was given on 14 March 2019.------General Department of Immigration
